Summary: Large, long, extremely bright, stationary object, very high in sky, in East & one even higher more SW,6:30 am , 11-3-12. I took a picture and have witnesses.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Saginaw Charter Township
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details11-3-12 6:30 am I was on my way to work and noticed a extremely bright light in the sky , looking East. At first I thought it could be a star or plane but as I continued to look at it , it appeared very long and extremely bright and it did not move. It appeared to have big round lights on each end and there was a beam that projected out in a triangle in the middle like a glare. I searched the sky for more and spotted another one more SW and much higher in the sky , both stationary. I arrived at work 20 minutes later ( I work at a hospital) when I got there the object was still there, stationary, in the same location(East). I got to my work area and brought several people to the window to view this object , they all confirmed the object and thought it was very strange. At that point it was time to get to work. I looked again when it was lighter out and the object was gone. When I first realized that this object was not a star or a plane it was a bit disturbing and I wasn't sure what to do. I wanted to call an authority of some sort but didn't know who to call and I had to get to work. I wanted to make sure I documented this so I took a picture on my cell phone and got some witnesses who confirmed what I saw. In the paper today I read an article of a young man who reported an object in Flint and your organization was listed. I did not know where to go with this info until this morning. This was not anything I have ever seen, it was extremely long, large , extremely bright and it did not move. I observed this within the time span of an hour. I'd be happy to answer any questions. It has bothered me ever since, not knowing what it was. I do still have the picture but it just appears as a very bright light.
